title: Shadow Creatures
description: It's just one week. For one week, my Alpha father is forcing me to stay at the compound and date the werewolf he wants me to end up with. How much could really go wrong in a week? I'm only pretending to give it a real chance. I'm in control of the situation. I decide who I want to be with. It's not like I'm going to fall in love. You can't fall in love when you're already in love.Besides, the benefits outweigh the risks. After I pretend to give him a chance for one week, I can leave my father's pack of wolves. Jax and I can finally be together, even if there is a chance that being together will kill us both. Well, that's if Jax doesn't die in some other way first.One of the Shade has made it clear he wants to kill him, and even worse, he's using a werewolf Hunter as his Host. I need to warn Jax that his life is in serious danger.  *** Please This YA paranormal romance is recommended for readers 17+ due to mild language. ***
author: Jody Morse
